septimiusseverus1.obverse_legend: IMP CAE L SEP SEV PERT AVG
septimiusseverus1.obverse_desc: Head of Septimius Severus, laureate, right
septimiusseverus1.reverse_desc: Bonus Eventus, draped, standing left, holding up basket of fruit in right hand and two corn-ears in left hand

aurelian1.obverse_desc: Bust of Aurelian, radiate, draped, right
aurelian1.reverse_desc: Aurelian, standing right, holding sceptre, receiving globe from Jupiter, standing left, holding sceptre

probus1.obverse_desc: Radiate bust of Probus to left, wearing consular robes/imperial mantle and holding eagle tipped scepter in his right hand
probus1.reverse_desc: Concordia standing front, her head turned to left, holding two standards

probus2.obverse_legend: IMP C PROBVS P F AVG
probus2.obverse_desc: Bust of Probus, radiate, wearing imperial mantle, left, holding sceptre surmounted by eagle in right hand
probus2.reverse_desc: Providentia, draped, standing left, holding globe in right hand and sceptre in left hand
